      • findPath

        public java.util.ArrayList<Node> findPath(Node startNode,
                                 Node endNode,
                                 int unitRadius)
        Finds the shortest path from one Node on the map to another, taking into account unit radius. If no path is available, returns the path that gets the unit closest to the target destination. Uses the A* pathfinding algorithm
        Parameters:
        startNode - The beginning Node on the path
        endNode - The destination Node of the path
        unitRadius - The radius of the unit to pathfind for
        Returns:
        The ArrayList of waypoint Nodes to get from the startNode to the endNode

      • reconstructPath

        private java.util.ArrayList<Node> reconstructPath(Node endNode)
        Reconstructs the path from an end Node to the beginning Node of the path
        Parameters:
        endNode - The final Node on the path
        Returns:
        The ArrayList of Nodes that make up the path from the beginning Node to the goal
